## BlockSvg.getCommentIcon() method

Get the comment icon attached to this block, or null if the block has no comment.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCommentIcon(): Comment | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Comment](./blockly.comment_class.md) \| null

The comment icon attached to this block, or null.
